author: Haruki Murakami
quote: The answer is dreams. Dreaming on and on. Entering the world of dreams and never coming out. Living in dreams for the rest of time.

author: Unknown
quote: The goal isn’t more money, The goal is living life on my own terms.

author: Rachel Corrie
quote: Follow your dreams, believe in yourself and don't give up.

author: Gail Godwin
quote: Dreams say what they mean, but they don't say it in daytime language.

author: Jay Weatherill
quote: You'll be much more successful if you follow your dreams and follow your passions.

author: Khalil Gibran
quote: I prefer to be a dreamer among the humblest, with visions to be realized, than lord among those without dreams and desires.

author: Tecumseh
quote: When the legends die, the dreams end; there is no more greatness.

author: Joseph Barbera
quote: That's what keeps me going: dreaming, inventing, then hoping and dreaming some more in order to keep dreaming.

author: Les Brown
quote: If you take responsibility for yourself you will develop a hunger to accomplish your dreams.

author: H. P. Lovecraft
quote: Ocean is more ancient than the mountains, and freighted with the memories and the dreams of Time.

author: Walt Disney Company
quote: If you can dream it, you can do it. Always remember that this whole thing was started with a dream and a mouse.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

author: Khalil Gibran
quote: Yesterday is but today's memory, and tomorrow is today's dream.

author: Inception
quote: Your world is not real!

author: George Santayana
quote: The dreamer can know no truth, not even about his dream, except by awaking out of it.

author: George Bernard Shaw
quote: You see things; and you say, "Why?" But I dream things that never were; and I say, "Why not?"

author: John Barrymore
quote: A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.

author: Les Brown
quote: It takes someone with a vision of the possibilities to attain new levels of experience. Someone with the courage to live his dreams.

author: Erma Bombeck
quote: Dreams have only one owner at a time. That's why dreamers are lonely.

author: Unknown
quote: It Feels Good To Be Lost In The Right Direction.

author: Unknown
quote: They who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.

author: Unknown
quote: Work while they sleep. Learn while they party. Save while they spend. Live like they dream.

author: Douglas Adams
quote: He felt that his whole life was some kind of dream and he sometimes wondered whose it was and whether they were enjoying it.

author: Yoko Ono
quote: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.

author: Vin Diesel
quote: It's insecurity that is always chasing you and standing in the way of your dreams.

author: Alfred Lord Tennyson
quote: Dreams are true while they last, and do we not live in dreams?

author: Unknown
quote: You Never Realize How Strong You Are Until Being Strong Is the Only Choice You Have.

author: Sigmund Freud
quote: The interpretation of dreams is the royal road to a knowledge of the unconscious activities of the mind.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t Tell People Your Dream. Show Them.

author: Nicholas Sparks
quote: What are we after all our dreams, after all our memories?

author: Henri Amiel
quote: Dreams are excursions into the limbo of things, a semi-deliverance from the human prison.

author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton
quote: Dream manfully and nobly, and thy dreams shall be prophets.

author: Anderson Silva
quote: You can't give up on your dreams.

author: William Shakespeare
quote: There are more things in Heaven and Earth, Horatio, than are dreamt of in your philosophy.

author: Unknown
quote: Time Decides Who You Meet In Life, Your Heart Decides Who You Want In Your Life, And Your Behaviour Decide Who Stays In Your Life.

author: Rush Limbaugh
quote: Capitalism is always evaluated against dreams. Utopia is a dream. It doesn't exist.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: A dreamer is one who can only find his way by moonlight, and his punishment is that he sees the dawn before the rest of the world.

author: Unknown
quote: If you don’t build your dreams, someone will hire you to help build theirs.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: No one has ever achieved greatness without dreams.

author: Ransom Riggs
quote: Strange, I thought, how you can be living your dreams and your nightmares at the very same time.

author: Unknown
quote: It Is Never Too Late To Be What You Might Have Been.

author: D. H. Lawrence
quote: I can never decide whether my dreams are the result of my thoughts, or my thoughts the result of my dreams.

author: William Shakespeare
quote: We are such stuff As dreams are made on, and our little life Is rounded with a sleep.

author: Unknown
quote: Follow your dreams they know the way.

author: Edgar Allan Poe
quote: All that we see or seem, is but a dream within a dream.

author: Lupita Nyong’o
quote: No matter where you’re from, your dreams are valid.

author: Valentina Tereshkova
quote: Anyone who has spent any time in space will love it for the rest of their lives. I achieved my childhood dream of the sky.

author: Unknown
quote: Life will only change when you become more committed to your dreams than you are to your comfort zone.

author: Frida Kahlo
quote: They thought I was a Surrealist, but I wasn't. I never painted dreams. I painted my own reality.

author: McKayla Maroney
quote: If you're following your dreams, you're doing something you love and that you believe in yourself for.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t Quit. Suffer Now And Live The Rest Of Your Life As A Champion.

author: Stoddard King, Jr.
quote: There's a long, long trail a-winding into the land of my dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: Sometimes life is about risking everything for a dream no one can see but you.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t Waste Words On People Who Deserve Your Silence. Sometimes The Most Powerful Thing You Can Say Is Nothing At All.

author: Unknown
quote: Because in the end we’re all just dreamers in an endless universe

author: Douglas MacArthur
quote: In my dreams I hear again the crash of guns, the rattle of musketry, the strange, mournful mutter of the battlefield.

author: John Lennon
quote: You may say I’m a dreamer, but I’m not the only one. I hope someday you’ll join us. And the world will live as one.

author: Bella Thorne
quote: I think everything about my life is magical. I've struggled, and against most odds, I'm truly having the experience of living my dreams.

author: Denis Waitley
quote: You have all the reason in the world to achieve your grandest dreams. Imagination plus innovation equals realization.

author: Marian Wright Edelman
quote: No person has the right to rain on your dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: When You Face Difficult Times, Know That Challenges Are Not Sent To Destroy You. They’re Sent To Promote, Increase And Strengthen You.

author: Charles Dickens
quote: I wish you to know that you have been the last dream of my soul.

author: Arthur Golden
quote: Sometimes we get through adversity only by imagining what the world might be like if our dreams should ever come true.

author: Unknown
quote: Fall Seven Times, Stand Up Eight.

author: Carl Sandburg
quote: Nothing happens unless first we dream.

author: Unknown
quote: If your dreams don’t scare you they aren't big enough.

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
quote: Whatever you do, or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius and power and magic in it.

author: Paulo Coelho
quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.

author: Dolly Parton
quote: A lot of dreams can turn to nightmares... if you don't really work them.

author: Jonas Salk
quote: I have had dreams, and I’ve had nightmares. I overcame the nightmares because of my dreams.

author: William Butler Yeats
quote: Take, if you must, this little bag of dreams, Unloose the cord, and they will wrap you round.

author: Khalil Gibran
quote: The most pitiful among men is he who turns his dreams into silver and gold.

author: James Dean
quote: Dream as if you’ll live forever. Live as if you’ll die today.

author: Aristotle
quote: For often, when one is asleep, there is something in consciousness which declares that what then presents itself is but a dream.

author: Winnie Harlow
quote: I am the underdog, and I want to prove that one can follow one's dreams despite all the flaws and setbacks.

author: Sasha Cohen
quote: Follow your dreams, work hard, practice and persevere. Make sure you eat a variety of foods, get plenty of exercise and maintain a healthy lifestyle.

author: Unknown
quote: It Always Seems Impossible Until It’s Done.

author: Unknown
quote: I am a day dreamer and a night thinker.

author: Unknown
quote: A dream is a wish your heart makes.

author: Colin Powell
quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.

author: Paul Wellstone
quote: Sometimes, the only realists are the dreamers.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t let small minds convince you that your dreams are too big.

author: Ryunosuke Satoro
quote: Let your dreams outgrow the shoes of your expectations.

author: Unknown
quote: Breathing dreams like air.

author: Jacob Latimore
quote: Keep God first, chase your dreams, and everything will pay off.

author: Frida Kahlo
quote: I never paint dreams or nightmares. I paint my own reality.

author: Unknown
quote: Revive your light. Manifest your dreams. Realize your worth.

author: Unknown
quote: You’re Never Too Young To Dream BIG!

author: Victor Hugo
quote: Our life dreams the Utopia. Our death achieves the Ideal.

author: Unknown
quote: Sometimes You Face Difficulties You’re Doing Something Wrong, But Because You’re Doing Something Right.

author: Unknown
quote: They Laugh At Me Because I’m Different; I Laugh At Them Because They’re All The Same.

author: Oprah Winfrey
quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.

author: Angelique Kerber
quote: Just follow your dreams and be patient.

author: Langston Hughes
quote: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly.

author: Dalai Lama
quote: Sleep is the best meditation.

author: Arthur O'Shaughnessy
quote: We are the music makers, and we are the dreamers of dreams.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Do not follow where the path may lead. Go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

author: Unknown
quote: Be All In Or Get All Out. There Is No Halfway.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t Call It A Dream Call It A Plan.

author: Narendra Modi
quote: We want an Afghanistan that is shaped by the dreams of the great Afghan people, not by irrational fears and overreaching ambitions of others.

author: Jean Genet
quote: A man must dream a long time in order to act with grandeur, and dreaming is nursed in darkness.

author: J.K. Rowling
quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.

author: Unknown
quote: It Always Seems Impossible Until Its Done.

author: Unknown
quote: Once You Start To See Results, It Becomes An Addiction.

author: Walt Disney Company
quote: No matter how your heart is grieving, if you keep on believing, the dreams that you wish will come true.

author: LL Cool J
quote: Stay focused, go after your dreams and keep moving toward your goals.

author: Roman Payne
quote: Never did the world make a queen of a girl who hides in houses and dreams without traveling.

author: Natalie Portman
quote: Everyone dreams of living in Paris.

author: Dorothy Gilman
quote: People need dreams, there's as much nourishment in 'em as food.

author: Mick Jagger
quote: Lose your dreams and you might lose your mind.

author: Unknown
quote: They never thought I would get this far they were right . I got even further.

author: Evelyn Waugh
quote: One can write, think and pray exclusively of others; dreams are all egocentric.

author: Unknown
quote: Sometimes You Have To Get Knocked Down Lower Than You Have Ever Been To Stand Back Up Taller Than You Ever Were.

author: William Shakespeare
quote: We are such stuff as dreams are made on; and our little life is rounded with a sleep.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Dreams don't work unless you take action. The surest way to make your dreams come true is to live them.

author: Unknown
quote: Growth Is Painful. Change Is Painful. But Nothing Is As Painful As Staying Stuck Somewhere You Don’t Belong.

author: Unknown
quote: I’ve Never Met A Strong Person With An Easy Part.

author: Will Smith
quote: Whatever your dream is, every extra penny you needs to be going to that.

author: Douglas Coupland
quote: Everybody past a certain age, regardless of how they look on the outside, pretty much constantly dreams of being able to escape from their lives.

author: Ferdinand Porsche
quote: I couldn't find the sports car of my dreams, so I built it myself.

author: Unknown
quote: I Am Strong Because I’ve Been Weak. I Am Fearless Because I’ve Been Afraid.

author: Mike Tyson
quote: I'm a dreamer. I have to dream and reach for the stars, and if I miss a star then I grab a handful of clouds.

author: Patrice Motsepe
quote: Education is at the heart of achieving your dreams.

author: Ralph Marston
quote: Dare to visualize a world in which your most treasured dreams have become true.

author: Tim Burton
quote: Visions are worth fighting for. Why spend your life making someone else's dreams?

author: Unknown
quote: If You Don’t Imagine, Nothing Ever Happens At All.

author: Gao Xingjian
quote: Dreams are more real than reality itself, they're closer to the self.

author: Anais Nin
quote: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.

author: Herb Brooks
quote: You know, Willie Wonka said it best: we are the makers of dreams, the dreamers of dreams.

author: Homer Hickam
quote: I have always found the best way to live is to be optimistic and energetic and willing to work hard for my dreams as well as the dreams of others.

author: Anatole France
quote: To accomplish great things, we must not only act but also dream; not only plan but also believe.

author: Aung San Suu Kyi
quote: Freedom and democracy are dreams you never give up.

author: Arijit Singh
quote: Singing for a documentary that benefits the underprivileged remains one of my biggest dreams.

author: Margaret Fuller
quote: Only the dreamer shall understand realities, though in truth his dreaming must be not out of proportion to his waking.

author: John Lennon
quote: You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us. And the world will live as one.

author: Leonardo da Vinci
quote: Why does the eye see a thing more clearly in dreams than the imagination when awake?

author: Unknown
quote: Forget Your Past, Forgive Yourself, And Begin Again Right Now.

author: Emil Zatopek
quote: An athlete cannot run with money in his pockets. He must run with hope in his heart and dreams in his head.

author: Henry Thomas Buckle
quote: Great minds discuss ideas. Average minds discuss events. Small minds discuss people.

author: Jimmy Carter
quote: We become not a melting pot but a beautiful mosaic. Different people, different beliefs, different yearnings, different hopes, different dreams.

author: Shimon Peres
quote: Count the dreams of your mind; if the numbers of the dreams exceeds the number of achievements, you are young.

author: Walt Disney
quote: I'd say it's been my biggest problem all my life... it's money. It takes a lot of money to make these dreams come true.

author: Ryunosuke Satoro
quote: Let your dreams outgrow the shoes of your expectations.

author: Unknown
quote: When You Start Seeing Your Worth, You’ll Find It Harder To Stay Around People Who Don’t.

author: John F. Kennedy
quote: We need men who can dream of things that never were.

author: Umberto Eco
quote: A dream is a scripture, and many scriptures are nothing but dreams.

author: Douglas H. Everett
quote: There are some people who live in a dream world, and there are some who face reality, and then there are those who turn one into the other.

author: Kalpana Chawla
quote: The path from dreams to success does exist. May you have the vision to find it, the courage to get on to it, and the perseverance to follow it.

author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez
quote: It is not true that people stop pursuing dreams because they grow old, they grow old because they stop pursuing dreams.

author: Usher
quote: Strivers achieve what dreamers believe.

author: The Talmud
quote: A dream which is not interpreted is like a letter which is not read.

author: Unknown
quote: Can You Remember Who You Were Before The World Told You Who You Should Be?

author: George Bernard Shaw
quote: Youth is a wonderful thing. What a crime to waste it on children.

author: Katie Stevens
quote: I think that they way my parents raised me, they taught me to always follow my dreams and never give up, no matter what the obstacle.

author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
quote: Great dreams of great dreamers are always transcended.

author: Unknown
quote: The 3C’S In Life” Choice, Chance, Change. You Must Make The Choice, To Take The Chance, If You Want Anything In Life To Change.

author: Mike Piazza
quote: Never let your dreams go away.

author: Unknown
quote: I’m Too Busy Working On My Own Grass To Notice If Yours Is Greener.

author: Napoleon Hill
quote: Man, alone, has the power to transform his thoughts into physical reality; man, alone, can dream and make his dreams come true.

author: Recep Tayyip Erdogan
quote: Your targets can only be realized on the basis of dreams.

author: Jim Bakker
quote: Oh, I was never a businessman. I was a visionary, a dreamer.

author: Unknown
quote: I dream my painting, and then I paint my dream.

author: Derek Jeter
quote: My office is at Yankee stadium. Yes, dreams do come true.

author: Tim Burton
quote: I can't remember any dreams in my life. There's so much strange in real life that it often seems like a dream.

author: Jonas Salk
quote: I have had dreams and I have had nightmares, but I have conquered my nightmares because of my dreams.

author: Bill McCartney
quote: Big dreams create the magic that stir men's souls to greatness.

author: Sarah Ban Breathnach
quote: The world needs dreamers and the world needs doers. But above all, the world needs dreamers who do.

author: Marine Le Pen
quote: We are in a world where globalization, which is an ideology, has forgotten and put aside the people, the people's interests, aspirations, and dreams.

author: Liam Cunningham
quote: I was an electrician, and now I'm in 'Electric Dreams.' It's almost bizarre.

author: Liza Minnelli
quote: I've said it before, but it's absolutely true: My mother gave me my drive, but my father gave me my dreams. Thanks to him, I could see a future.

author: Carl Jung
quote: Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.

author: Cardi B
quote: I was always scared to follow my dreams because if I follow my dreams and I fail, I can't dream about it anymore. It's easier to settle for less.

author: Sylvia Mathews Burwell
quote: Job training empowers people to realize their dreams and improve their lives.

author: William Butler Yeats
quote: In dreams begins responsibility.

author: Jonas Salk
quote: There is hope in dreams, imagination, and in the courage of those who wish to make those dreams a reality.

author: Langston Hughes
quote: Hold fast to dreams for if dreams die, life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly.

author: Unknown
quote: What Would You Do If You Weren’t Afraid?

author: E. V. Lucas
quote: One of the most adventurous things left us is to go to bed. For no one can lay a hand on our dreams.

author: Spike Lee
quote: It has been my observation that parents kill more dreams than anybody.

author: Malala Yousafzai
quote: Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow's reality.

author: Jim Valvano
quote: Be a dreamer. If you don't know how to dream, you're dead.

author: Jesse Jackson
quote: We've removed the ceiling above our dreams. There are no more impossible dreams.

author: Stephenie Meyer
quote: I like the night. Without the dark, we'd never see the stars.

author: Billy Wilder
quote: You have to have a dream so you can get up in the morning.

author: Anne Sexton
quote: In a dream you are never eighty.

author: Aziz Ansari
quote: Do It Under the Influence Yourself! That's what we're shooting for! Get drunk and make your dreams come true.

author: Black Elk
quote: Sometimes dreams are wiser than waking.

author: Paracelsus
quote: From time immemorial artistic insights have been revealed to artists in their sleep and in dreams, so that at all times they ardently desired them.

author: Unknown
quote: If You Can’t Stop Thinking About It, Don’t Stop Working For It.

author: Malala Yousafzai
quote: Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow’s reality.

author: Emile Durkheim
quote: Reality seems valueless by comparison with the dreams of fevered imaginations; reality is therefore abandoned.

author: William Faulkner
quote: Dreams have only one owner at a time. That's why dreamers are lonely.

author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
quote: God's gifts put man's best dreams to shame.

author: Mary Shelley
quote: My dreams were at once more fantastic and agreeable than my writings.

author: Unknown
quote: Die with memories not dreams.

author: H. P. Lovecraft
quote: But are not the dreams of poets and the tales of travellers notoriously false?

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: A dreamer is one who can only find his way by moonlight, and his punishment is that he sees the dawn before the rest of the world.

author: Sigmund Freud
quote: Dreams are often most profound when they seem the most crazy.

author: Kristanna Loken
quote: Believe in and follow your dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: Every morning you have two choices: Continue to sleep with your dreams. Or wake up and chase them.

author: Unknown
quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

author: Roopleen
quote: If you have a dream, don’t just sit there. Gather courage to believe that you can succeed and leave no stone unturned to make it a reality.

author: Ruth Handler
quote: They were using the dolls to project their dreams of their own futures as adult women.

author: Erich Fromm
quote: A dream is a microscope through which we look at the hidden occurrences in our soul.

author: Douglas Coupland
quote: Flying dreams mean that you're doing the right thing with your life.

author: Zhuangzi
quote: I do not know whether I was then a man dreaming I was a butterfly, or whether I am now a butterfly dreaming I am a man.

author: Rene Descartes
quote: I am accustomed to sleep and in my dreams to imagine the same things that lunatics imagine when awake.

author: Mo Farah
quote: I've shown that if you dream and are willing to work hard, you can achieve your dreams.

author: Zora Neale Hurston
quote: It is one of the blessings of this world that few people see visions and dream dreams.

author: Colin Powell
quote: A dream doesn’t become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination, and hard work.

author: John Wooden
quote: Don't give up on your dreams, or your dreams will give up on you.

author: Unknown
quote: I Would Rather Regret The Things I Have Done Than The Things I Have Not.

author: Alice Sebold
quote: Sometimes the dreams that come true are the dreams you never even knew you had.

author: Frida Kahlo
quote: I don't paint dreams or nightmares, I paint my own reality.

author: William Dement
quote: Dreaming permits each and every one of us to be quietly and safely insane every night of our lives.

author: Unknown
quote: Keep Your Hopes Up.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t Let The Behavior Of Others Destroy Inner Peace.

author: Unknown
quote: Dreams are illustrations from the book your soul is writing about you.

author: John Lennon
quote: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t Tell Me What They Said About Me, Tell Me Why They Were So Comfortable To Say It Around You.

author: Stefano Gabbana
quote: Dreams can still come true; you need a great deal of energy and determination, and a little bit of luck.

author: Sergey Brin
quote: I would like to see anyone be able to achieve their dreams, and that's what this organization does.

author: Laini Taylor
quote: It was impossible, of course. But when did that ever stop any dreamer from dreaming.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: The surest way to make your dreams come true is to live them.

author: Herb Caen
quote: A city is not gauged by its length and width, but by the broadness of its vision and the height of its dreams.

author: Israel Broussard
quote: I wanted to be a musician, either a guitarist or a drummer. I guess my dreams were in the entertainment industry, and I landed somewhere along there.

author: Paracelsus
quote: The interpretation of dreams is a great art.

author: Jeremy Irons
quote: We all have our time machines. Some take us back, they're called memories. Some take us forward, they're called dreams.

author: Sugar Ray Leonard
quote: Within our dreams and aspirations we find our opportunities.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t downgrade your dream just to fit your reality. Upgrade your conviction to match your destiny.

author: Unknown
quote: Life Has No Remote, Get Up And Change It Yourself.

author: Unknown
quote: If You Obey All The Rules You Miss All The Fun.

author: Gloria Steinem
quote: Without leaps of imagination, or dreaming, we lose the excitement of possibilities. Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.

author: Karl Malone
quote: Sometimes, you follow your dreams. I say to the young people, 'If you have a dream, chase it.'

author: Unknown
quote: Some See A Weed, Some See A Wish.

author: Katie Holmes
quote: We all keep dreaming, and luckily, dreams come true.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

author: Daya
quote: Believe in yourself, go after your dreams, and don't let anyone put you in a box.

author: Stephen Butler Leacock
quote: It may be that those who do most, dream most.

author: Unknown
quote: To get rich you have to be making money while you’re asleep.

author: Charlotte Brontë
quote: A ruffled mind makes a restless pillow.

author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón
quote: Every book has a soul, the soul of the person who wrote it and the soul of those who read it and dream about it.

author: Judy Garland
quote: We cast away priceless time in dreams, born of imagination, fed upon illusion, and put to death by reality.

author: D. H. Lawrence
quote: The world of men is dreaming, it has gone mad in its sleep, and a snake is strangling it, but it can't wake up.

author: Unknown
quote: Dreams are only thoughts you didn't have time to think about during the day.

author: Douglas Adams
quote: He was a dreamer, a thinker, a speculative philosopher... or, as his wife would have it, an idiot.

author: Gilda Radner
quote: Dreams are like paper, they tear so easily.

author: Walt Disney Company
quote: But they say if you dream a thing more than once, it's sure to come true.

author: Malcolm Forbes
quote: When you cease to dream you cease to live.

author: Unknown
quote: You are free to choose, but you are not free from the consequence of your choice

author: David Copperfield
quote: Dreams are illusions, and we can't let go of them because we would be dead.

author: Mary Kom
quote: I miss my kids, and they miss me. It's very difficult, but I have to do it for my country and fulfill my dreams coming to the 2012 London Olympics.

author: Tupac Shakur
quote: During your life, never stop dreaming. No one can take away your dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: Keep On Dreaming Even If It Breaks Your Heart.

author: Unknown
quote: Work hard till the door of your car open in a vertical way.

author: Tupac Shakur
quote: Reality is wrong. Dreams are for real.

author: Jim Valvano
quote: Be a dreamer. If you don't know how to dream, you're dead.

author: W. H. Auden
quote: Learn from your dreams what you lack.

author: Virginia Woolf
quote: Yet it is in our idleness, in our dreams, that the submerged truth sometimes comes to the top.

author: Kalpana Chawla
quote: The path from dreams to does exist. May you have the vision to find it, the courage to get on to it, and the perseverance to follow it.

author: Madonna Ciccone
quote: I stand for freedom of expression, doing what you believe in, and going after your dreams.

author: Arna Bontemps
quote: Let us keep the dance of rain our fathers kept and tread our dreams beneath the jungle sky.

author: Unknown
quote: Dream. Believe. Do. Repeat.

author: Colin Powell
quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination, and hard work.

author: Langston Hughes
quote: I have discovered in life that there are ways of getting almost anywhere you want to go, if you really want to go.

author: Unknown
quote: In The End, We Only Regret The Chances We Didn’t Take.

author: Unknown
quote: Failure Is The Opportunity To Being Again More Intelligently.

author: Unknown
quote: I Am A Daydreamer And A Nightthinker.

author: Walt Disney
quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.

author: Cam'ron
quote: Go to school and get your education and follow your dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: Nobody Is Too Busy, It’s Just A Matter Of Priorities.

author: Inception
quote: Dreams feel real while we're in them. It's only when we wake up that we realize something was actually strange.

author: Unknown
quote: If you can dream it, You can do it.

author: Goethe
quote: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.

author: Unknown
quote: The Say If You Dream A Thing More Than Once, It’s Sure To Come True.

author: Maximillian Degenerez
quote: No wishes are silly, no dreams remain dreams, for those committed to clear and definitive goals.

author: Unknown
quote: Wake Up With Determination. Go To Bed With Satisfaction.

author: Peter McWilliams
quote: To the degree we're not living our dreams, our comfort zone has more control of us than we have over ourselves.

author: Oscar Hammerstein II
quote: You gotta have a dream. If you don't have a dream, how you gonna make a dream come true?

author: Norman Cousins
quote: People are never more insecure than when they become obsessed with their fears at the expense of their dreams.

author: Fantasia Barrino
quote: You can't tell me that dreams don't come true. My life is proof that they do.

author: Unknown
quote: Ask Yourself If What You’re Doing Today Is Getting You Closer To Where You Want To Be Tomorrow.

author: Anais Nin
quote: Dreams are necessary to life.

author: Fernando Pessoa
quote: I am nothing. I'll never be anything. I couldn't want to be something. Apart from that, I have in me all the dreams in the world.

author: John Lennon
quote: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is a reality.

author: Baltasar Gracian
quote: Dreams will get you nowhere, a good kick in the pants will take you a long way.

author: Martin Luther King Jr.
quote: Free at last, Free at last, Thank God almighty we are free at last.

author: Kobe Yamada
quote: Follow your dreams, they know the way.

author: William Butler Yeats
quote: Tread softly because you tread on my dreams.

author: Napoleon Hill
quote: Cherish your visions and your dreams as they are the children of your soul, the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.

author: Chris Kyle
quote: When I grew up, I only had two dreams. One was to be a cowboy and another was to be in the military. I grew up extremely patriotic and riding horses.

author: Shanice Williams
quote: Go out and chase your dreams no matter how crazy it looks.

author: Katori Hall
quote: Follow your intuition, listening to your dreams, your inner voice to guide you.

author: Marian Anderson
quote: When you stop having dreams and ideals, well, you might as well stop altogether.

author: C.S. Lewis
quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

author: John Locke
quote: Reverie is when ideas float in our mind without reflection or regard of the understanding.

author: Debby Boone
quote: Dreams are the seeds of change. Nothing ever grows without a seed, and nothing ever changes without a dream.

author: Seuss
quote: You know you’re in love when you can’t fall asleep because the reality is finally better than your dreams.

author: W. Clement Stone
quote: No matter how carefully you plan your goals they will never be more than pipe dreams unless you pursue them with gusto.

author: Lance Bass
quote: I think everyone dreams of that nice romantic wedding.

author: Unknown
quote: I’m Very Picky With Whom I Give My Energy To. I Prefer To Reserve My Time, Intensity And Spirit Exclusively To Those Who Reflect Sincerity.

author: Paul Bryant
quote: There's a lot of blood, sweat, and guts between dreams and success.

author: Janet Reno
quote: Our challenge is to remind ourselves that we do have common interest, common grounds, and common dreams.

author: Robert Conklin
quote: Dreams get you into the future and add excitement to the present.

author: William Butler Yeats
quote: I have spread my dreams beneath your feet; Tread softly because you tread on my dreams.

author: Mary, Crown Princess of Denmark
quote: I mean, every child at one stage dreams of being a prince or a princess.

author: Edgar Cayce
quote: Dreams are today's answers to tomorrow's questions.

author: Unknown
quote: If You Can Dream It, You Can Do It.

author: Unknown
quote: You Were Given This Life Because You Are Strong Enough To Live It.

author: Laurie Hernandez
quote: I want to be a role model. I want to be able to know that I inspired girls to work hard and go for their dreams and to never give up.

author: Anais Nin
quote: Dreams pass into the reality of action. From the actions stems the dream again; and this interdependence produces the highest form of living.

author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
quote: Dreams about the future are always filled with gadgets.

author: Unknown
quote: Life Is Not Measured By The Number Of Breaths We Take, But By The Moments That Take Our Breath Away.

author: A. Milne
quote: I think we dream so we don’t have to be apart for so long. If we’re in each other’s dreams, we can be together all the time.

author: Unknown
quote: If You Don’t Know Where You Want To Go, Then It Doesn’t Matter Which Path You Take.

author: Anatole France
quote: To accomplish great things, we must not only act but also dream; not only plan but also believe.

author: Dr. Seuss
quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.

author: Christopher Reeve
quote: So many of our dreams at first seem impossible, then they seem improbable, and then, when we summon the will, they soon become inevitable.

author: Unknown
quote: She Dreams More Often Than She Sleeps.

author: Havelock Ellis
quote: Dreams are real while they last, can we say more of life?

author: Newsies
quote: For a dreamer, night's the only time of day.

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
quote: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.

author: William Wordsworth
quote: Huge and mighty forms that do not live like living men, moved slowly through the mind by day and were trouble to my dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: Your life is your business. Don’t let someone else run it.

author: James A. Michener
quote: The permanent temptation of life is to confuse dreams with reality. The permanent defeat of life comes when dreams are surrendered to reality.

author: Erma Bombeck
quote: It takes a lot of courage to show your dreams to someone else.

author: Brian May
quote: Queen songs tend to be about very personal things: personal dreams and personal ambitions.

author: LL Cool J
quote: Dreams don't have deadlines. I'm thinking of doing bigger and better things and having more fun with it.

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: Dreams grow if you grow.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.

author: Martin Garrix
quote: I want to show everyone that if you pursue your dreams, they can come true no matter what. That's what I want to do.

author: Walt Disney Company
quote: No matter how your heart is grieving, if you keep on believing, the dreams that you wish will come true.

author: Elie Wiesel
quote: No one may speak for the dead, no one may interpret their mutilated dreams and visions.

author: Donovan Bailey
quote: Follow your passion, be prepared to work hard and sacrifice, and, above all, don’t let anyone limit your dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: People will laugh at your dreams then hate you when you make them come true.

author: Carl Jung
quote: Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.

author: Les Brown
quote: I think of myself as a catalyst of action and a messenger of hope, turning people onto themselves and turning people onto their dreams.

author: Aeschylus
quote: I know how men in exile feed on dreams.

author: Werner Herzog
quote: What would an ocean be without a monster lurking in the dark? It would be like sleep without dreams.

author: James Dean
quote: Dream as if you’ll live forever, live as if you’ll die today.

author: A.A. Milne
quote: I think we dream so we don’t have to be apart for so long. If we’re in each other’s dreams, we can be together all the time.

author: Swami Vivekanada
quote: The whole life is a succession of dreams. My ambition is to be a conscious dreamer that is all.

author: Unknown
quote: The distance between your dreams and reality is called action.

author: Jack Kerouac
quote: All human beings are also dream beings. Dreaming ties all mankind together.

author: Zendaya
quote: One of my dreams is to walk down the runway during Fashion Week!

author: Vin Scully
quote: Don't let the winds blow your dreams away... or steal your faith in God.

author: Michael Bloomberg
quote: This is the city of dreamers and time and again it's the place where the greatest dream of all, the American dream, has been tested and has triumphed.

author: Unknown
quote: My goal is to build a life, I don’t need a vacation from.

author: Ben Carson
quote: Through hard work, perseverance and a faith in God, you can live your dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: I Am Not What Happened To Me. I Am What I Choose To Become.

author: Paulo Coelho
quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: The fear of failure.

author: Khalil Gibran
quote: Yesterday is but today’s memory, and tomorrow is today’s dream.

author: Alber Elbaz
quote: For me, the sketching of dresses was about fantasy and dreams. In my little room at home, I felt that I was somewhere else. In Paris, for instance.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: Dreams are the touchstones of our characters.

author: Dawn Richard
quote: Dreams rise like the sun and set like the sun: One minute, it is high and bright; the next minute, you might lose it.

author: Unknown
quote: The Strongest People Are Not Those Who Show Strength In Front Of Us But Those Who Win Battles We Know Nothing About.

author: Unknown
quote: If you have a heartbeat, there ‘s still time for your dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: Never stop Dreaming.

author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca
quote: For all life is a dream, and dreams themselves are only dreams.

author: Khalil Gibran
quote: Trust in dreams, for in them is hidden the gate to eternity.

author: Tupac Shakur
quote: Reality is wrong. Dreams are for real.

author: Jason Mraz
quote: It’s strange how dreams get under your skin and give your heart a test for what’s real and what’s imaginary.

author: Amanda Lindhout
quote: You have a responsibility to move your dreams forward, no matter what.

author: Unknown
quote: Make your dreams happen.

author: Tom Bradley
quote: The only thing that will stop you from fulfilling your dreams is you.

author: Unknown
quote: Keep your heart open to dreams. For as long as there's a dream, there is hope, and as long as there is hope, there is joy in living.

author: Unknown
quote: It’s difficult to follow your dream. It’s a tragedy not to.

author: Unknown
quote: If you want to be successful you have to be willing to disappear for a while.

author: Diane von Furstenberg
quote: I don't like to talk about my dreams. I like to make them happen. I prefer to talk about them when they're done.

author: Jim Carrey
quote: It is better to risk starving to death then surrender. If you give up on your dreams, what's left?

author: Ajith Kumar
quote: Aren't we all dreamers? It's only because man dreamt of flying that we are travelling in planes. Behind all inventions, we see the dreams of people.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I'm sick of following my dreams. I'm just going to ask them where they're goin', and hook up with them later.

author: Unknown
quote: Make Your Dream Happen.

author: John Glenn
quote: Old folks have dreams and ambitions too, like everybody else. Don't sit on a couch someplace.

author: Unknown
quote: Make it happen. Shock everyone.

author: James M. Barrie
quote: Dreams do come true, if we only wish hard enough, You can have anything in life if you will sacrifice everything else for it.

author: Jonas Salk
quote: Hope lies in dreams, in imagination, and in the courage of those who dare to make dreams into reality.

author: Mary Webb
quote: Saddle your dreams before you ride em.

author: Unknown
quote: Things Take Time. So Just Be Patient.

author: Natalie du Toit
quote: You have to work hard for what you want to achieve and you have to set goals and dreams and really go for them.

author: Aaron Rodgers
quote: I'm fulfilling my dreams that I had as a kid every single day.

author: Susan Sontag
quote: I was not looking for my dreams to interpret my life, but rather for my life to interpret my dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: Life Isn’t About Finding Yourself. Life Is About Creating Yourself.

author: Georg C. Lichtenberg
quote: Much can be inferred about a man from his mistress: in her one beholds his weaknesses and his dreams.

author: Umberto Eco
quote: The real hero is always a hero by mistake; he dreams of being an honest coward like everybody else.

author: Candace Parker
quote: Today I know that there is still work to be done, but along the way my I am achieving my dreams.

author: Marsha Norman
quote: Dreams are illustrations... from the book your soul is writing about you.

author: Lupita Nyong’o
quote: No matter where you’re from, your dreams are valid.

author: Unknown
quote: My best dreams and worst nightmares have the same people in them.

author: Bernard Kelvin Clive
quote: Permit your dreams to see the daylight.

author: Unknown
quote: Sometimes The Right Path Is Not The Easiest One.

author: Vincent van Gogh
quote: I dream my painting and I paint my dream.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: Sleeping is no mean art: for its sake one must stay awake all day.

author: Wayne Huizenga
quote: Some people dream of success, while other people get up in the morning and make it happen.

author: Unknown
quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: If you have built castles in the air, your work need not be lost; that is where they should be. Now put the foundations under them.

author: Unknown
quote: You Have Within You, Right Now, Everything You Need To Deal With Whatever The World Can Throw At You.

author: Unknown
quote: If you want something you never had. You have to do something you’ve never done.

author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
quote: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.

author: Vivian Mercer
quote: Recall the old story of the rather refined young man who preferred sex dreams to visiting brothels because he met a much nicer type of girl that way.

author: H. P. Lovecraft
quote: I never ask a man what his business is, for it never interests me. What I ask him about are his thoughts and dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: I Have Got The Dreamer Disease

author: Ian McEwan
quote: The cost of oblivious daydreaming was always this moment of return, the realignment with what had been before and now seemed a little worse.

author: K. Rowling
quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.

author: Anne Brontë
quote: I love the silent hour of night, For blissful dreams may then arise, Revealing to my charmed sight What may not bless my waking eyes.

author: Sylvia Mathews Burwell
quote: Job training empowers people to realize their dreams and improve their lives.

author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
quote: Never give up on what you really want to do. The person with big dreams is more powerful than the one with all the facts.

author: Unknown
quote: If You Haven’t Found It Yet, Keep Looking.

author: Benjamin E. Mays
quote: It isn't a calamity to die with dreams unfulfilled, but it is a calamity not to dream.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Do not follow where the path may lead. Go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

author: Edgar Allan Poe
quote: All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream.

author: David Bailey
quote: A positive attitude can really make dreams come true  it did for me.

author: Paul Watson
quote: Follow your dreams and use your natural-born talents and skills to make this a better world for tomorrow.

author: Joy Page
quote: Dream and give yourself permission to envision a You that you choose to be.

author: Haruki Murakami
quote: I dream. Sometimes I think that's the only right thing to do.

author: Unknown
quote: Sleep... Oh! how I loathe those little slices of death.

author: Unknown
quote: Only ride with people you’ve walked with.

author: Joanne Harris
quote: I dream a lot, in colour and in sound and scent. Quite a few of my stories have come from dreams.

author: Marsha Norman
quote: Dreams are illustrations from the book your soul is writing about you.

author: William Butler Yeats
quote: But I, being poor, have only my dreams; I have spread my dreams under your feet; Tread softly because you tread on my dreams.

author: Plutarch
quote: All men whilst they are awake are in one common world: but each of them, when he is asleep, is in a world of his own.

author: Unknown
quote: Sometimes Life Is About Risking Everything For A Dream No One Can See But You.

author: Bob Dylan
quote: I'll let you be in my dreams if I can be in yours

author: Lois McMaster Bujold
quote: Seems like half my anxiety dreams are about airports.

author: Unknown
quote: Nothing Can Dim The Light That Shines From Within.

author: Criss Jami
quote: Closed in a room, my imagination becomes the universe, and the rest of the world is missing out.

author: John Updike
quote: Dreams come true. Without that possibility, nature would not incite us to have them.

author: Unknown
quote: Everything start with a dream.

author: Unknown
quote: Dreaming after all is a form of planning.

author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca
quote: For even in dreams a good deed is not lost.

author: J. K. Rowling
quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.

author: Unknown
quote: May My Heart Be Brave, My Mind Fierce, And My Spirit Free.

author: Michel de Montaigne
quote: Those who have compared our life to a dream were right... We sleeping wake, and waking sleep.

author: Unknown
quote: Money isn’t everything but everything needs money.

author: Joel Osteen
quote: Do all you can to make your dreams come true.

author: R.J. Palacio
quote: Sometimes I think my head is so big because it is so full of dreams

author: Walt Disney Company
quote: Here you leave today and enter the world of yesterday, tomorrow, and fantasy.

author: Unknown
quote: If You’re Lucky Enough To Be Different, Don’t Ever Change.

author: Eva Green
quote: I am a dreamer. Seriously, I'm living on another planet.

author: John Barrymore
quote: A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: The Distance Between Your Dreams And Reality Is Call Action.

author: Bob Dylan
quote: I'll let you be in my dreams if I can be in yours.

author: Joseph Conrad
quote: Perhaps life is just that... a dream and a fear.

author: Jack Johnson
quote: Don't let your dreams be dreams.

author: Kalpana Chawla
quote: Listen to the sounds of nature. Wishing you the best on your trek towards your dreams.

author: John C. Maxwell
quote: The dreams and passions stored within hearts are powerful keys which can unlock a wealth of potential.

author: C.S. Lewis
quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

author: Unknown
quote: Sometimes You Just Need To Distance Yourself From People. If They Care, They’ll Notice. If They Don’t You Know Where You Stand.

author: Hugh Hefner
quote: In my wildest dreams, I could not have imagined a sweeter life.

author: Unknown
quote: Go Ahead Tell Me That I’m Not Good Enough Tell Me I Can’t Do It Because I Will Show You Over & Over That I Can!

author: Edgar Allan Poe
quote: Deep into that darkness peering, long I stood there, wondering, fearing, doubting, dreaming dreams no mortal ever dared to dream before.

author: Paracelsus
quote: Dreams must be heeded and accepted. For a great many of them come true.

author: Unknown
quote: Believe in your dreams. They were given to you for a reason.

author: M. C. Escher
quote: I don't use drugs, my dreams are frightening enough.

author: Alice Sebold
quote: Sometimes the dreams that come true are the dreams you never even knew you had.

author: Unknown
quote: The Struggle You’re In Today Is Developing The Strength You Need For Tomorrow.

author: Ben Barnes
quote: I only remember the end of my dreams, like waking up at a steering wheel, or falling.

author: Danica McKellar
quote: Believe it or not, lots of people change their majors and abandon their dreams just to avoid a couple of math classes in college.

author: Theodore Zeldin
quote: A dream is what makes people love life even when it is painful.

author: Langston Hughes
quote: Hold fast to dreams For when dreams go Life is a barren field Frozen with snow.

author: Unknown
quote: Do Or Do Not. There Is No Try.

author: Greg Anderson
quote: When we are motivated by goals that have deep meaning, by dreams that need completion, by pure love that needs expressing, then we truly live.

author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
quote: The life of a man consists not in seeing visions and in dreaming dreams, but in active charity and in willing service.

author: Christopher Reeve
quote: So many of our dreams at first seem impossible, then they seem improbable, and then, when we summon the will, they soon become inevitable.

author: Unknown
quote: Learn The Rules Like A Pro So You Can Break Them Like An Artist.

author: Simone Weil
quote: A test of what is real is that it is hard and rough. Joys are found in it, not pleasure. What is pleasant belongs to dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: I Want To See The World. Follow A Map To Its Edges…

author: Salvador Dalí
quote: At the age of six I wanted to be a cook. At seven I wanted to be Napoleon. And my ambition has been growing steadily ever since.

author: Unknown
quote: Stay Positive, Work Hard, Make It Happen.

author: Donovan Bailey
quote: Follow your passion, be prepared to work hard and sacrifice, and, above all, don't let anyone limit your dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: Dreams don’t work unless you do.

author: Ingmar Bergman
quote: My pictures are always part of my thinking, and my emotions, tensions, dreams, desires.

author: Gloria Steinem
quote: Without leaps of imagination or dreaming, we lose the excitement of possibilities. Dreaming, after all is a form of planning.

author: Wim Wenders
quote: Without dreams, there can be no courage. And without courage, there can be no action.

author: Alexandre Dumas
quote: When you compare the sorrows of real life to the pleasures of the imaginary one, you will never want to live again, only to dream forever.

author: Napoleon Hill
quote: Man, alone, has the power to transform his thoughts into physical reality; man, alone, can dream and make his dreams come true.

author: Ernest Hemingway
quote: I love sleep. My life has the tendency to fall apart when I'm awake, you know?

author: Unknown
quote: A Single Dream Is More Powerful Than A Thousand Realities.

author: Oprah Winfrey
quote: You can have it all. Just not all at once.

author: Tupac Shakur
quote: The only thing that comes to a sleeping man is dreams.

author: Walt Disney
quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.

author: Laurie Hernandez
quote: I hope I can help inspire people to go for their dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: Do What You Have To Do Until You Can Do What You Want To Do.

author: LL Cool J
quote: Stay focused, go after your dreams and keep moving toward your goals.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Dare to live the life you have dreamed for yourself. Go forward and make your dreams come true.

author: Unknown
quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.

author: Stephen Colbert
quote: Thankfully, dreams can change. If we'd all stuck with our first dream, the world would be overrun with cowboys and princesses.

author: Edward Kennedy
quote: The work goes on, the cause endures, the hope still lives and the dreams shall never die.

author: Richard Bach
quote: You're never given a dream without also being given the power to make it true.

author: Kumail Nanjiani
quote: You can go slow. Allow your dreams and goals to change, but live an intentional life.

author: Unknown
quote: Keep your heart open to dreams. For as long as there's a dream, there is hope, and as long as there is hope, there is joy in living.

author: Brandon Sanderson
quote: Expectations were like fine pottery. The harder you held them, the more likely they were to crack.

author: Dan Gertler
quote: Everyone comes with dreams and illusions and promises. Everyone wants quick deals. They don't want to invest.

author: Unknown
quote: You Have To Be At Your Strongest When You’re feeling At Your Weakest.

author: Helen Keller
quote: The most pathetic person in the world is some one who has sight but no vision.

author: Chin-Ning Chu
quote: A successful life is one that is lived through understanding and pursuing one's own path, not chasing after the dreams of others.

author: Unknown
quote: Hustle until your haters start asking you for a job.

author: Dale Turner
quote: Dreams are renewable. No matter what our age or condition, there are still untapped possibilities within us and new beauty waiting to be born.

author: Neil Gorsuch
quote: Ours is the job of interpreting the Constitution. And that document isn't some inkblot on which litigants may project their hopes and dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: Dream imagine & believe.

author: Suzy Kassem
quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.

author: Anaïs Nin
quote: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.

author: Chris Brown
quote: Follow your dreams. Just make sure to have fun too.

author: Man Ray
quote: I paint what cannot be photographed, that which comes from the imagination or from dreams, or from an unconscious drive.

author: Unknown
quote: Work until expensive become cheap.

author: Mario Benedetti
quote: Five minutes are enough to dream a whole life, that is how relative time is.

author: Reem Acra
quote: I'm sure that everyone who goes into fashion always dreams of having a perfume, since it completes the brand and exposes it in a different way.

author: Bill Watterson
quote: I think we dream so we don't have to be apart so long. If we're in each other's dreams, we can play together all night.

author: Sarah Ban Breathnach
quote: The world needs dreamers and the world needs doers. But above all, the world needs dreamers who do.

author: Paul Valery
quote: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.

author: LL Cool J
quote: I think when you move past your fear and you go after your dreams wholeheartedly, you become free.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Dream your own dreams, achieve your own goals. Your journey is your own and unique.

author: Edgar Allan Poe
quote: Yet mad I am not... and very surely do I not dream.

author: James Dean
quote: Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today.

author: Vincent Van Gogh
quote: I dream of painting and then I paint my dream.

author: Unknown
quote: Your Mind Is A Powerful Thing. When You Fill It With Positive Thoughts, Your Life Will Start To Change.

author: Bianca Balti
quote: You keep dreaming big, never put the limit on your dreams, and believe that everything can come true.

author: Walt Disney
quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t tell people your dreams. Show them.

author: Unknown
quote: One day you’ll call me and get a response from my assistance.

author: Aristotle
quote: Hope is a waking dream.

author: Marilyn Manson
quote: When all of your wishes are granted, many of your dreams will be destroyed.

author: Unknown
quote: To Live Will Be An Awfully Big Adventure.

author: Ashleigh Brilliant
quote: The best reason for having dreams is that in dreams no reasons are necessary.

author: Unknown
quote: I Deserve To Be Happy

author: Steven Kloves
quote: In dreams, we enter a world that's entirely our own.

author: Terri Guillemets
quote: Some colors exist in dreams that are not present in the waking spectrum.

author: Thomas Jefferson
quote: I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.

author: Unknown
quote: So many people want this lifestyle. But so few’re going to do what it takes to get it.

author: Marlee Matlin
quote: I hope I inspire people who hear. Hearing people have the ability to remove barriers that prevent deaf people from achieving their dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: Never Apologize For Having High Standards. People Who Really Want To Be In Your Life Will Rise Up To Meet Them.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: Our truest life is when we are in dreams awake.

author: G.K. Chesterton
quote: The center of every man's existence is a dream.

author: Kevin Kwan
quote: One of the dreams on my wish list is to spend more time in Thailand.

author: Eric Hoffer
quote: We do not really feel grateful toward those who make our dreams come true; they ruin our dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: We Are The Dreamers Of Dreaming.

author: Juliette Lewis
quote: The worst thing you can do to a kid is tell them that their dreams are invalid.

author: Anatole France
quote: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.

author: John C. Maxwell
quote: The dreams and passions stored within hearts are powerful keys which can unlock a wealth of potential.

author: Unknown
quote: The Question Isn’t Who Is Going To Let Me; It’s Who Is Going To Stop Me.

author: Unknown
quote: Work until your bank account looks like a phone number.

author: Unknown
quote: Hey Little Fighter, Soon Things Will Be Brighter.

author: Paul Valery
quote: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.

author: Les Brown
quote: Help others achieve their dreams and you will achieve yours.

author: Nonito Donaire
quote: The motivation is in my heart to work toward my goals and my dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: I worked while they partied, Now I party while they work.

author: Naveen Jain
quote: Don't let expertise fool you into seeing false boundaries or underestimating those with wild dreams.

author: Friedrich Schiller
quote: Keep true to the dreams of your youth.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: Friends... they cherish one another's hopes. They are kind to one another's dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: The average millionaire has seven source of income.

author: Anais Nin
quote: Our life is composed greatly from dreams, from the unconscious, and they must be brought into connection with action. They must be woven together.

author: Unknown
quote: Better Things Are Coming.

author: Joseph Campbell
quote: Myths are public dreams, dreams are private myths.

author: Unknown
quote: You Can Never Cross The Ocean Unless You Have The Courage To Lose Sight Of The Shore.

author: Unknown
quote: Do Not Pray For An Easy Life, Pray For The Strength To Endure A Difficult One.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t Wait. Life Goes Faster Than You Think.

author: Unknown
quote: Sometimes The Bad Things That Happen In Our Lives Put Us Directly On The Best Things That Will Ever Happen To Us.

author: Unknown
quote: You’re Allowed To Scream, You’re Allowed To Cry, But Do Not Give Up.

author: Les Brown
quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.

author: Unknown
quote: Only Those Who Care About You Can Hear You When You’re Quiet.

author: Langston Hughes
quote: Hold fast to dreams, For if dreams die life is a broken-winged bird, That cannot fly.

author: Elias Canetti
quote: All the things one has forgotten scream for help in dreams.

author: Paul Gauguin
quote: Life being what it is, one dreams of revenge.

author: Unknown
quote: One Of The Happiest Moments In Life Is When You Find The Courage To Let Go Of What You Can’t Change.

author: Unknown
quote: Believe You Can And You’re Halfway There.

author: Haruki Murakami
quote: The answer is dreams. Dreaming on and on. Entering the world of dreams and never coming out. Living in dreams for the rest of time.

author: Edgar Allan Poe
quote: Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.

author: Kevin Hart
quote: I stayed true to my dreams and, eventually, they came true.

author: Theodor Wiesengrund Adorno
quote: Even the loveliest dream bears like a blemish its difference from reality, the awareness that what it grants is mere illusion.

author: Anne Campbell
quote: You can plant a dream.

author: Unknown
quote: Dream On Dreamer

author: Twyla Tharp
quote: In dreams, anything can be anything, and everybody can do. We can fly, we can turn upside down, we can transform into anything.

author: Ralph Lauren
quote: I don't design clothes, I design dreams.

author: Alain Wertheimer
quote: We're in the business of selling pleasure. We don't sell handbags or haute couture. We sell dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: You Only Live Once, You Might As Well As A Badass!

author: Clifton Fadiman
quote: Insomnia is a gross feeder. It will nourish itself on any kind of thinking, including thinking about not thinking.

author: L.M. Montgomery
quote: You may tire of reality but you never tire of dreams.

author: Liya Kebede
quote: I don't listen to people who say my dreams are impossible; I just work to prove them wrong.

author: Eugene Ionesco
quote: Ideologies separate us. Dreams and anguish bring us together.

author: Suzy Kassem
quote: A heart without dreams is like a bird without feathers.

author: Enrique Iglesias
quote: I know it sounds corny, but when you follow your dreams, it happens. And if it's music, take it seriously.

author: Booker T. Washington
quote: If you can't read, it's going to be hard to realize dreams.

author: Justin Bieber
quote: A girl has to have a beautiful smile, Beautiful eyes and she should have a good sense of humor. She should be honest, loving and trustworthy.

author: Jawaharlal Nehru
quote: Without peace, all other dreams vanish and are reduced to ashes.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t Downgrade Your Dream Just To Fit Your Reality. Upgrade Your Conviction To Match Your Destiny.

author: Anais Nin
quote: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new , a new country.

author: Jean Baudrillard
quote: Like dreams, statistics are a form of wish fulfillment.

author: Unknown
quote: If You Want Something You Never Had, You Have To Do Something You’ve Never Done.

author: Myles Munroe
quote: Every human heart cries and yearns for the same thing: a chance to fulfill his or her own dreams and desires. Even the poorest man has a dream.

author: Dave Matthews
quote: Take what you can from your dreams, make them as real as anything.

author: Joey King
quote: You have to keep going and pursue your dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.

author: Unknown
quote: The Only Person You Should Try To Be Better Than, Is The Person You Were Yesterday.

author: Emma Goldman
quote: When we can't dream any longer we die.

author: Unknown
quote: Hope Is The Only Thing Stronger Than Fear.

author: Jean-Paul Sartre
quote: Like all dreamers, I mistook disenchantment for truth.

author: Unknown
quote: You Attract What You Are, Not What You Want If You Want Great, Then Be Great.

author: Ferdinand Porsche
quote: I couldn't find the sports car of my dreams, so I built it myself.

author: Jesse Jackson
quote: Our dreams must be stronger than our memories. We must be pulled by our dreams, rater than pushed by our memories.

author: William Shakespeare
quote: We are such stuff as dreams are made on, and our little life is rounded with a sleep.

author: Edgar Allan Poe
quote: It is by no means an irrational fancy that, in a future existence, we shall look upon what we think our present existence, as a dream.

author: Unknown
quote: You cannot drive an audi R8 working 9 to

author: Princess Diana
quote: I want my boys to have an understanding of people's emotions, their insecurities, people's distress, and their hopes and dreams.
